Quickstart Guide¶

Now that we have ibkr_api installed. Let us do some real work. This module primarily offer you three interfaces to send and receive data. The first interface, the IBKR_API class, is the simplest to use, as it hides much of the underlying complexity of an asynchronous event driven api.

Request Handlers¶

Before a given api function is called. A check is performed to see if there is a corresponding “pre_<function_name>” function. If so this function will be invoked before the API call is made. After the call is made, another check for a “post_<function_name>” function.

ibkr-api
